snippet: The Israeli military said the teenager, Adnan Abu Khater, 17, was one of a group of people who vandalized the border fence on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: The Israeli military said the teenager, Adnan Abu Khater, 17, was one of a group of people who vandalized the border fence on Thursday.

headline.main: Israel: Palestinian Dies of Wounds After Shooting by Soldiers at Border
headline.print_headline: Israel: Palestinian Dies of Wounds After Shooting by Soldiers at Border
